name: Cute Eater
description: Sweet Eater is a game about a creature (I won't say which one) that can invert its skin colors. What is it for? It's a good question, the fact is that in the world of the Sweet Eater, food also has the ability to invert its structure, and he has to change his skin for the food he will eat ... Yes, play already, and you yourself will understand everything ...
